Articles.Content: How do I do EVAs? I just got back form MINECRAFTing it up for about 3 months, so I came back to this. HALP MEEE!
Either right-click on the capsule door and choose a guy off the little screen that pops up, or hover the mouse over one of the crew portraits and a little EVA button will appear upper-left.
lol I bet there\'s a lot of KSP / minecraft overlap. I\'m loving the influx of creativity-based indie games over the past few years.
